header.name: Brian Elting
header.title: Senior Web Developer
header.summary: I'm a full stack web developer specializing in Node.js and Spring Boot microservices. Over the past few years, I have built web applications for a wide variety of industries. I'm always looking to learn new technologies and deliver the best user experience.

positions.title: Senior Backend Software Engineer
bullets: Created Node.js lending app with REST APIs using Typescript, NestJS, PostgreSQL and Amazon S3
Drove adoption of feature modules, dependency injection and OpenAPI specification in legacy codebase

positions.title: Engineering Lead
bullets: Developed Node.js microservices using TypeScript, PostgreSQL, Snowflake and various API integrations
Designed and implemented authentication and authorization strategies across services with Okta and JWTs
Helped drive key architectural decisions and created proof of concepts for consultant data platform
Built internal NPM packages and Python library to share core functionality throughout codebase
Led development of Node.js backend and CLI for Terraform generation application written in TypeScript

positions.title: Senior Engineer
bullets: Architected microservices using TypeScript and GraphQL for internal project management app
Built Node.js modules in TypeScript for Azure IoT Edge deployed to ships for predictive maintenance
Developed Spring Boot microservices for greenhouse growing platform using Java, MySQL and Auth0
Worked on Node.js back end for travel Slack bot, integrating Api.ai and flight tracking APIs
Created trucking fleet portal using React and Amazon Cognito while contributing to Java back end

positions.title: Engineer
bullets: Built configurable admin framework with React and MongoDB to quickly create portals on future projects
Continued development of AngularJS front end and Java back end for video editing platform

positions.title: Front End Developer
bullets: Worked on AngularJS web application for platform supporting video editors and content creators

positions.title: Web Developer
bullets: Develop Node.js applications using Express and AngularJS in ES2015
Work with team to build and maintain C# .NET integrations with multiple providers
Wrote private NPM packages to share custom settings and Gulp build process
Built Hootsuite app plugin for company’s Shoppost product using Node.js and MongoDB
Created Flex widget to integrate interactive storefronts with Facebook timeline and news feed

positions.title: Interactive Developer
bullets: Created widget framework in ActionScript 3 and directed small team in its use to build interactive ads
Built the company’s corporate website using ASP .NET MVC
Worked with team on the development of ecommerce platform, primarily focusing on the front end

positions.title: Web Designer
bullets: Collaborated with senior developer to build responsive ActionScript 3 widget for music platform
Designed prototypes, customer website mockups and other technical assets in Photoshop and Illustrator
Participated in the design and creation of a wide range of products, including websites, widgets and videos

positions.title: Marketing Intern
bullets: Assisted with various projects using Adobe Creative Suite and Microsoft Office
Conducted online research and built customer database

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
Bachelor of Arts in Business Administration: Finance and Marketing

body: Do you want to connect or just say hello?
